fields.name: project
docs: The wallet that has authority to modify the assembler

fields.name: collection
docs: The collection address of the assembler generated NFTs

fields.name: collectionName
docs: The collection name to be associated with each nft

fields.name: collectionSymbol
docs: The collection symbol to be associated with each nft

fields.name: collectionDescription
docs: The collection description to be associated with each nft

fields.name: nftBaseUri
docs: The base uri of each nft metadata

fields.name: assemblingAction
docs: Action to take for the block SFT while assembling

fields.name: nfts
docs: The number of NFTs created by this assembler

fields.name: allowDuplicates
docs: Should this assembler allow duplicate NFTs

fields.name: assembler
docs: The assembler this block is associated to

fields.name: blockOrder
docs: The order of the block in layers

fields.name: isGraphical
docs: Is there a image for this block

fields.name: block
docs: The block this definition is associated to

fields.name: mint
docs: The mint address of the block definition

fields.name: value
docs: The value of the block definition

fields.name: assembler
docs: The assembler this NFT is associated to

fields.name: authority
docs: The wallet that has pre mint authority over this NFT

fields.name: collectionAddress
docs: The collection address of this NFT

fields.name: mint
docs: The mint address of this NFT

fields.name: minted
docs: Flag if this NFT is minted

fields.name: isGenerated
docs: Flag if the image for this nft is already generated

fields.name: nft
docs: The NFT this constraint is associated to

fields.name: uri
docs: URI pointing to JSON representing the asset

fields.name: sellerFeeBasisPoints
docs: Royalty basis points that goes to creators in secondary sales (0-10000)

fields.name: mint
docs: The token mint associated with this attribute

fields.name: order
docs: The order this attribute is to be place on

errors.name: Unauthorized
errors.msg: The provided authority or delegate authority is not valid

errors.name: BlockTypeMismatch
errors.msg: The type of block is not same as the block definition value provided

errors.name: RequiredBlockImage
errors.msg: The particular block requires an image in definition

errors.name: InvalidBlockType
errors.msg: The block has an invalid type

errors.name: InvalidMetadata
errors.msg: The metadata provided for the mint is not valid

errors.name: InvalidTokenForBlockDefinition
errors.msg: The token is not valid for this block definition

errors.name: BlockExistsForNFT
errors.msg: NFT attribute is already present for this block

errors.name: BlockDoesNotExistsForNFT
errors.msg: NFT does not have attribute for this block

errors.name: NFTNotBurnable
errors.msg: The NFT is cannot be burned

errors.name: InitialArtGenerated
errors.msg: The initial generation of art is already complete
